content:
Today I chose issue 1093 for discussion!

basic theory of Lie algebras
Created by @Scott Morrison (@semorrison) on 2019-05-28
Labels: feature-request, help wanted

Is this issue still relevant? Any recent updates? Anyone making progress?

Maybe worth commenting that one of the reasons that issue is still open is that I haven't set up the category of Lie algebras and done limit, colimits but that this is something I would like to do once I get some other things out of the way.

Today I chose issue 1093 for discussion!

basic theory of Lie algebras
Created by @Scott Morrison (@semorrison) on 2019-05-28
Labels: help wanted, feature-request

Is this issue still relevant? Any recent updates? Anyone making progress?
Perhaps we should close this, opening a new one to track representation theory, and whatever else @Oliver Nash thinks should come next?
Yes I agree. I'll close this and open a new issue in its place later today.
Over a month later I finally addressed this issue by closing it and creating a new project instead: https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib/projects/14
